sentence.Network_en: Objective : To investigate the anti - aging effect of aqueous extract of Hedysarum austrosibiricum cultivated in Xinjiang.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 研究新疆红芪水提取物对衰老模型小鼠的影响,从氧自由基代谢方面初步探讨其 抗 衰老的作用机制.

sentence.Network_en: Methods The contents of trace elements of Hedysarum semenovii Regelet Herd root were determined by ICP - AES.
sentence.Network_cn: 方法应用电感耦合等离子体-原子发射光谱法对天山岩黄芪根中微量元素的含量进行测定.

sentence.Network_en: ObjectiveTo provide reference for rational exploiting and utilizing the plant of Hedysarum Linn.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的为合理开发利用岩黄芪属植物资源提供.
